main event: A couple and their two small children observed a bright light in the sky while driving on Hwy. 71 near Holgate, Ohio, on April 7, 1967.
interesting points: The observed light was moving very fast, then stopped and hovered over their vehicle for a few minutes,The light illuminated the inside of the car,The observer described the light as having the appearance of a 'flying saucer',The estimated size of the object was approximately 200 feet in diameter,The incident was reported to the local sheriff's office.
witness description: a couple and two small children
